creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
While searching a "Search default"-dialog is presented.

When I change the value of "Sort by" from "Score" to "Title" (while "Fields" is 
set to "contents") I get no hitlist instead of one with a single entry in the 
case of "Sort by" being set to "Score".

The log says:

.search(): EXCEPTION: java.lang.RuntimeException: field "title" does not appear 
to be indexed
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
bobharner@gmail.com
text: *** Bug 32648 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Is this bug still valid in 1.4-dev? With the current implementation I don't see
any sort options at all ...
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: indeed. closing this issue. (although some sorting would be cool in the future.)
creator: nettings@apache.org
